website_summaries.verdict: A professional option for portable stage lighting that is easy to set up and use quickly.
pros: Large support bracket protects the light head during rotation
Can be controlled with the voice or automatically
Comes with different lighting patterns and effects
cons: Light is not as bright or noticeable as other options unless surrounding lights are turned off

customer_reviews.title: Beast !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beast !!! Lights are banging I’m a dj for 22 years they perform mint
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Pro Light Effect For Small Money
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 4pcs set for our bar and we are very satisfied. The fixtures truly light up our dancefloor and gogo dancers. They work as a stand alone with their internal mic, as master and slave but ultimately the best with a dmx controller and your own programmed chases. Dont worry, programming DMX is not difficult and with that you can use the moving heads to the max. Crisp colors, brightness for such a small unit is incredibly awesome, gobos are on point. If you are looking for a small LED moving head fixture then this is your best choice to get pro light effects for small money.
customer_reviews.author: M.Winkler

customer_reviews.title: One Light...Two Light? Red Light Blue Light...
customer_reviews.text: Nice light! Small and portable. The listing is misleading as it looks like it is for TWO lights. It’s is NOT...they will send ONLY only it’s a Front Back picture which makes it appear to be two for that price.
customer_reviews.author: SlamminSam

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Set two up at a trade show. Using a DMX controller for a simple "searchlight" looking move. We turned them on Saturday night and they ran literally 24-7 non-stop until Wednesday morning. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: DroneSouthdotCom

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Works fantastic. Many options, although I feel the manual could be a little more in depth. As described and is a great compliment to my set-up. The second light I just purchased was supposed to be black, but was a white one. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hendrickson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great light!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with performance... would be great if the head have a lock for transport, hope it last.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Gestiada

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good ligth for the prices!!!! Highly recommend calls that were coming over come and get an assist cancel
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price. I hope they will last. I was definitely a little concerned about the product quality especially for the price. Overall I am pretty impressed. I purchased four units. Setup was easy. All worked during setup. One would not receive an address during a live show so I was bummed that I had to take out of service. The fixture throws a pretty decent beam. Approx 20 feet. They definitely add the extra dynamic I needed for our shows. I will most likely buy several more of these units if they hold up for a couple of moths.
customer_reviews.author: chris thornton

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one to see if I would like it and well, sadly I was highly disappointed. The gobos were stuck between transitions so you would see two gobos at once and sometimes a white light with a gobo pattern... the mechanics worked as designed as far as the movement, and the sound sensor worked great, but the transitions were not all that great. I returned it as I did not want to take a chance on getting another defective one. I was really looking forward to it, sad.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase if you’re starting to get into lighting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product mostly to add some flash to our shows and to do something creative at a summer camp for teenagers. It is very easy to control DMX wise. It comes with a guide that tells you the channels and what they are programmed for. It does make for a more interesting stage to have moving lights. What I don’t like about this product is actually the “gobo” or different designs you can change the spot to. I thought they were kinda wonky. I might feel differently if I used it with a haze machine but I don’t know at this point. I mean, it moves, it’s bright, it’s DMX controlled and it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Steinhour

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Keeping in mind the price....these units were great! They all powered on, synced too DMX, and have functioned for quite some time now. If you are reading this though....keep in mind they are not Chauvet Pros or even ADJ so don't be surprised when the gobos misalign or if you have to manually adjust the motor position while they're on. Super cost effective and functional. Period.
customer_reviews.author: ODG123

customer_reviews.title: GOOD FOR PARTIES & DJ EQUIPMENT
customer_reviews.text: Pros: New unique design, functional led circle, uniform blending effect. * Combined with a variety of patterns and colors to highlight the atmosphere. * Compact structure, efficient dissipation and stable performance. * Support DMX, sound control and self-propelled operation (clapping) * Easy to install on the floor, or hung on the truss with brackets and screws. * Easy to use Cons: * It’s kinda noisy to my ears. * It doesn’t have ON or OFF button you need to unplug it to turn it OFF. All in all great for party. Good movement and great lightning.
customer_reviews.author: Steffi Juanico

customer_reviews.title: Smoked from vents
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a gift. After a short while it no longer rotated on auto. We thoroughly checked it out. We contacted the company who gave suggestions and to take pics and videos of the problem. However, it began to smoke from the vents and has always been used in a well ventilated area. The cord seemed hot and soft almost melting in an area as well. There is something defective with this one we received. Luckily he unplugged it, and came to let me know immediately and it didn’t cause a fire. Dangerous. We hope to receive a replacement with remote from the company. Awaiting their response.
customer_reviews.author: LUC

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok. Worth the money but has issues
customer_reviews.text: These lights are ok. I ordered two and had a issue with one making a funky sound when turning it on. I tried to make a profile for use with dot2 software but the dmx channels didn’t match the profile with the manual that was provided. I had to figure out what each Dmx channel did on my own. You can determine how to find this out by patching in each channel as a dimmer. From here just turn on each channel one by one to find out what each channel does. I do recommend buying these but be ready to figure out how to operate these on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel G.

customer_reviews.title: Poor condition and advertising!
customer_reviews.text: This light was delivered in poor condition. It looks used. The lens had dust on the inside and out. Scratches on the case. it didn't even come with a power cord. As others have complained, the image makes it seem like you are getting a two pack when you're only getting one. Very disappointed in this seller.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Finster

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and it’s AWESOME!! 🤩
customer_reviews.text: My husband did this Video and he was very hyped while doing it. The head light is really good. He's a DJ and he tried using it at home during our Christmas party and it really sets the mood! Like what he said "Very easy to use and it's AWESOME!"
customer_reviews.author: Almarc B

customer_reviews.title: You need more than one
customer_reviews.text: I like that this unit was small enough to carry around and I did like the array of patterns and colors. I didn't like that it wasn't bright enough by itself in a complete darkroom I thought 25 watts was good but I guess it's not. You need multiple units to light up a room or even a stage... If I had a permanent place to mount these I would defiantly purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Gdiddy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price. Some problems with gobo
customer_reviews.text: The Gobos do get stuck pretty often in between colors so that's a little annoying. Other than that, great product for the price. If there is a way I can fix the problem I'm having with the gobos getting stuck or sent a new part to fix it I would gladly change my review to five stars
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: There ok, not a lot of power but they seem to work ok for the price
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Best light under a hundred bucks!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Inexpensive Extremely fast movement Good construction Decently bright Split Colors are nice Gobos/Patterns are great for the cost Cons Slow to identify sound Fan noise To see my head to head of this light compared to the other guys, look up “h2hcheaplights” on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Rob R

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Product Description
customer_reviews.text: The picture in the description made me think that I am getting two. I was so disappointed. Also, the product seems used. There are scratches all over the item. I am returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: robasce

customer_reviews.title: These are great lights and for the price can’t be beat
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights and for the price can’t be beat. Highly recommend getting a dmx controller to really get the most out of them.
customer_reviews.author: R Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Very strong
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing. Put them in the party room of our fraternity house and they have held up to the damage. Nothing wrong with them at all. Do not even need the controller to operate. Very user friendly and portable.
customer_reviews.author: Will D

customer_reviews.title: IT works great when the lights are turned off but have a ...
customer_reviews.text: You Get your moneys worth. IT works great when the lights are turned off but have a low light beam throw. i tried these out for an outdoor event. i coudlnt even notice if it was on. :/ there okay. but yeah. i can see why others buy the more expesive kind.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy Ramos

customer_reviews.title: OK lights, but quality issues
customer_reviews.text: The lights themselves are good, but after only a few weeks one of them has started to make some awful noises/sounds like there is grinding inside. Would buy again if they fixed quality issues.
customer_reviews.author: J.G

customer_reviews.title: Completely misleading!
customer_reviews.text: This is a completely misleading product representation. I fully believed I was purchasing two units and only one unit was delivered. After receiving my unit I find out that others feel that they have been mislead also. Not happy at all. Send me the other unit or take this one back and refund my money!
customer_reviews.author: brent miller

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the money patterns are limited but will work for my needs for now
customer_reviews.author: jon peat

customer_reviews.title: These lights are too small for practical use.
customer_reviews.text: These lights are much too small for practical use. I work at a small bar and even when hung up 10 feet the light is just too small to make a difference. I suggest saving your money and purchasing something bigger. LIKE I SAID IT IS A SMALL BAR!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These work well in my boutique nightclub and the seller was highly responsive to a question I had.
customer_reviews.author: Northmelon

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Great moving heads for the price. Go with higher watt bulb versions if using on a truss behind a band with other lights.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Porter

customer_reviews.title: Good little light!
customer_reviews.text: Great light, compact and light weight. Very brights, and loaded with lots of modes and setting.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Light show
customer_reviews.text: 4 or more puts one heck of a light show
customer_reviews.author: DJ Hale

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 unit in box
customer_reviews.text: Image is deceiving because it makes you think you’re getting 2 units for the price but you’re only getting one. I should have read carefully but in the past the lights I have purchased have always come in pairs so I assumed this one did as well. Also I wish the lights were brighter
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: U king  spot movin head
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these one is working fine and he other one doesnt work right (Update- after talking to them they fix the issue and replace the unit i will update after i get the replacement )
customer_reviews.author: Irving

customer_reviews.title: Words to full headline
customer_reviews.text: Thought for some reason it was 2 instead of one but meh
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Confusing
customer_reviews.text: The picture is kinda confusing, it looks like a pair of them for $100
customer_reviews.author: laurence anthony malabanan

customer_reviews.title: Light it up
customer_reviews.text: This lights really do make a big difference I miss judge them work perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Prisco saldivar

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic for the price, actually well built.
customer_reviews.text: Love them, plan on having at least 8 in my lineup
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I only received one of the lights when the price stated was for two. It is way smaller than i anticipated
customer_reviews.author: Georgette McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Picture Missed leading!
customer_reviews.text: This is ONLY ONE Light head! I was under the impression that it was two! It seems to work good just out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: As my first dj moving headlight is good Works perfect and for the price is perfect im ...
customer_reviews.text: As my first dj moving headlight is good Works perfect and for the price is perfect im fosure gonna buy few more...
customer_reviews.author: Casper

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great light. It's a beast for the price. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: No manual!
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged in a thin cardboard box wrapped and taped up with some garbage bag like plastic. Similar to the bundles you see on the show “Border Wars”. Didn’t come with a user manual so I had no way of programming it. Amazon was no help. Manufacturer was no help. Seller was no help eventually sent me a manual but the information within was terrible and loaded with grammar and spelling mistakes. No help. If you’re just going to plug it in and let it do it’s thing it’s ok for the money, but if you’re planning on programming it to a controller, good luck. Very unsatisfied, Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Pistacchio

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: These lights worked great and will be buying more! They add flair to any event!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Peyton

customer_reviews.title: bright LED lights bright 8 colours love it
customer_reviews.text: What a great dance light super bright I will be ordering another soon small unit but works great so far !
customer_reviews.author: C. LaMont

customer_reviews.title: The light is super bright for these size and powerful
customer_reviews.text: The light is super bright for these size and powerful. Fast and seemingly well built. Robust and very easy to use. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: These are super cool! I am not sure how to make ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super cool! I am not sure how to make them work opposite yet but i. Sure there is a way but will be great with my dj equipment
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Uribe

customer_reviews.title: Probably not a problem for some one familiar with the new lighting systems but for an old analog guy like me, it might as well been printed in ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent lights but very little to no instructions on usage. Probably not a problem for some one familiar with the new lighting systems but for an old analog guy like me, it might as well been printed in brail!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Rechtien

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased the lights for small venues and they work great! Very bright not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lights for small venues and they work great! Very bright not what I expected. 😊
customer_reviews.author: DAWN DEMEGLIO

customer_reviews.title: This product it shows two lites I got one what’s ...
customer_reviews.text: This product it shows two lites I got one what’s going on
customer_reviews.author: Charlie  tunez

customer_reviews.title: Mini led spot
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. One came with cracked outter casing. Am pretty disappointed to do that. Get what you pay for though I guess. Otherwise both work great. Will try to fix the one with broken case.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good light, my only issue is that it doesn't illuminate as well as i thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bell

product_meta.title: U`King LED Moving Head Light Spot 4 Color Gobos Light 25W DMX with Show KT V Disco DJ Party for Stage Lighting
feature_bullets: LED Stage Light Color Effect has 8 pattern, 8 colors, half color effect and color rotation speed.
4 Control Mode With Automatic operation, Voice, DMX512, Master Slave. (This moving head is a single unit and the picture shows the front side & reverse side of the item.)
Scanning Angle have 540 °, speed can be controlled, 270 °, speed can be controlled.
Moving Head Light for DJ Dance halls, KTV, Party, Home decoration are widely used in the stage, wedding, and other different occasions, increase the romantic atmosphere.
Lighting effect video:https://youtu.be/79SKcG2dxos. Free return and fast refund in without questions in 1 month if you are not satisfy this product.
